tool_description: The WhatsApp Message Sender API allows you to effortlessly send personalized messages to WhatsApp users. With this API, you can easily integrate WhatsApp messaging functionality into your applications, websites, or services, enabling you to engage with your users in a convenient and familiar way.
name: Jaarvis-Whatsapp-Messaging
title: Jaarvis-Whatsapp-Messaging

api_list.name: Whatsapp Message Sender
api_list.description: The WhatsApp Message Sender API allows you to send customized messages to WhatsApp users. This documentation provides details on how to use the API and the required data for sending messages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jaarvis-whatsapp-messaging.p.rapidapi.com/message/sendMsgToContact"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jaarvis-whatsapp-messaging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://jaarvis-whatsapp-messaging.p.rapidapi.com/message/sendMsgToContact"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
